0.1.name: wordpress/writer
0.1.description: CAUTION: This is a purely content-only theme with a design catered to typography and readability, driven towards writers. There are no menus, widgets, pages, search or anything else outside of the posts page and single posts. This is a minimalist, responsive theme designed around content, not bells and whistles. Thank you. - Official Support Forum: bryanhadaway.com/forum/projects
